casebody.data:
Noemi ESCOBAR, individually and as Guardian for J.V., an infant, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
David A. MAZIE and Mazie, Slater, Katz & Freeman, LLC, Defendants-Movants,
v.
Jose Betances, Third-Party Defendant. M-971 September Term 2018
082766 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 14, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
